name: swiss
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
belonging to or relating to Switzerland or its people: The meeting took place at a Swiss spa resort. Meyer Guggenheim was a Swiss Jew who emigrated to the US and made a fortune in mining and smelting.

Swiss noun [C]
(PERSON)
[ C ] a person from Switzerland: You can only buy a chalet here if you are a Swiss.

Swiss noun [C]
(CHEESE)
[ U ] US informal (also swiss) short for Swiss cheese: hard cheese with a mild (= not strong) flavour and large holes in it: I use sharp cheddar instead of swiss.
